import React from "react"; import './EventCard.scss'; import he from 'he'; import banner from '../../assets/default-event-posters-image5.jpg' const EventCard = ({ event }) => { const { name, event_website, description, } = event; const decodedDescription = he.decode(description); return (
{name}
